title: Power Shift
description:
Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00WVQ1S2A
A USA Today bestselling book and Book 2 in the #1 Wished for Horror Anthology, The Charming Shifter Mysteries Boxed Set, Books 1 - 3, by New York Times Bestselling author Calinda BShifters are dying in mysterious ways.Red Mountainbear, a blowhard, money-grubbing conservative from Fairbanks, wants to take over leadership of the town of Charming, Alaska. Town manager Chia Petit is determined to solve the mystery, protect the shifters and save her town. Hindered by her vampire roommate, helped by her Husky dog shape shifter best friend, Chia has more than a few challenges ahead.And then, romantic possibilities arrive in the form of a very sexy bounty hunter.When Hung Durand, ultra-sexy bounty hunter and shape shifter extraordinaire comes to town, with romance on his mind, she's distracted from her focus. His tantalizing presence makes her adherence to rules vaporize as she contemplates shameless, naughty acts with the outlaw.Will she lose the entire town?Will Chia lose her town to those with dollar signs clouding their judgment, or will her undeniable, wanton attraction to Hung distract her efforts? Or, worse yet, will her vampire roommate take his crazy pranks too far, resulting in her untimely death? Find out in this cozy mystery with a vampire bite.
author: Calinda B.
